name: Acolyte
equipment: A holy symbol, a prayer book, 5 sticks of incense, vestments
description: You can perform religious ceremonies of your deity and command the respect of those who share your faith.

name: Charlatan
equipment: A set of fine clothes, a disguise kit, tools for your cons
description: You have created a second identity that includes documentation, established acquaintances, and disguises.

name: Criminal
equipment: A crowbar, a set of dark clothes including a hood, 15 gp
description: You have a reliable and trustworthy contact who acts as your liaison to a network of other criminals.
